scripts
=======

Various scripts I use throughout the day

utc
=====
```
> utc 2012-01-01 '2013-06-04 12:00'
1325397600000 - 2012-01-01 00:00:00 -0600
1370365200000 - 2013-06-04 12:00:00 -0500

> utc 1325397600000 1370365200000
1325397600000 - 2012-01-01 00:00:00 -0600
1370365200000 - 2013-06-04 12:00:00 -0500
```
